title: REMAKE!
body: Someone in the enemy team purposely afk'ed just so their team could /remake! my proof is that after the game finished the person who PURPOSELY afk'ed types "planned". this remake thing is a good solution to 4v5s and stuff but make the discipline a lot more harsh, for example 1 year ban KAPPA. That was actually so annoying because i waited in queue for 15 mins. SIGH.  FIX THIS!

replies.body: That player will still receive a loss and a leaver penalty, so the benefits are pretty negligible being outweighed by the punishment. At Diamond+ the whole premade will receive a loss as well, so high elo players can't squeeze out any extra that way at all.
